message: If anyone wants/can help wit the look of the forum, let me know.
We will be switching over to a Vanilla forums system, similar to convore, but with more options. More customization for forums/group permissions, as well as addons.
Once Lee points tempestpa.com to my name servers, that site will point directly to it, and it will be under Tempestpa.com full time rather than my domain name.
Oh and speaking of add ons does the site support a mobile version?
Never mind answered my own question, it has one built in, sweet.
I have all the logo stuff still from the old forums that I can shape to whatever specs are needed
ya I just checked it. I'll give you admin so you can check out the backend and set the banner
Is HTML enabled signatures a security risk?
thanks for taking the server stuff wedge, lee and i kept meaning to get to it but work has stolen our souls
no problem whatsoever, i own a mostly unused website, so i'm glad to do it.
should start pointing to your site soon wedge.  thanks again for sorting this out.
Tempestpa.com is now pointing at the new site. Update your links
Do we need to create new login's for the site?
